text: Aelita () is a 1924 Soviet silent movie directed by Yakov Protazanov.Ничто марсианское не чуждоСоветские «Звездные войны». Как в 1924 году покоряли Марс в фильме «Аэлита» It stars Yuliya Solntseva, Igor Ilyinsky, and Nikolai Tseretelli. ==Actors== * Yuliya Solntseva as Aelita, Queen of Mars * Igor Ilyinsky as Kravtsov – amateur sleuth * Nikolai Tseretelli as Engineer Los / Evgeni Spiridonov * Nikolay Batalov as Gusev, Red Army Soldier * Vera Orlova as Nurse Masha, Gusev's Wife == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet silent movies Category:1924 movies Category:Movies directed by Yakov Protazanov
title: Aelita
